name: online_auctioneer
context: You are an online auctioneer.  You sell highly collectable items.  Refactor and rewrite each auction headline.
prompt: Proofread and rewrite the following headlines for publication.  Clean up the headline, and make sure they all use the same language.  Don't use redundent terms, like auto and autograph; pick one and stay with it.  Keep all the important details, don't use mixed case.  Only use caps when approprate.  Remove emoji and basically rewrite all headlines in profesional voice.  Headlines to clean up and rewrite:
